resources.string: MAIN SCREEN\n\nThis is the main screen activity where the current playing song is shown, it includes the operator player buttons and the song details, in this Acitivity can be used the MediaPlayer Android API.
SONGS LIBRARY\n\nIn this Activity the user access to his music library downloaded songs, search and click on to play them.

SEARCH MUSIC\n\nIn this Activity the user can search for new music online through, for example, a client library for Google Music called gmusic.api or through an implicit intent web search (Intent.ACTION_WEB_SEARCH) and purchase directly from the app using the Android Pay API implementation.
SETTINGS\n\nIn this Activity the user can change the settings from the music player for example music source folder, customization settings, audio settings, etc
